actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend Public Law 874, 81st Congress, to provide that children of parents employed on Federal property who attend school in a State contiguous to the State in which such property is situated may be counted for purposes of determining the aid entitlement of the local educational agency having jurisdiction over such school.

summary.text: Allows the children of parents employed on Federal property who attend school in a State contiguous to the State in which such property is located to be counted in determining the aid entitlement of the local educational agency having jurisdiction over such school.

titles.title: A bill to amend Public Law 874, 81st Congress, to provide that children of parents employed on Federal property who attend school in a State contiguous to the State in which such property is situated may be counted for purposes of determining the aid entitlement of the local educational agency having jurisdiction over such school.
